title: Tentacled starspawn

|   | A lumbering maw shrouded in a mass of sinuous tentacles. On spotting prey, its tentacles lunge outward, dragging victims directly to its waiting gullet. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

A **tentacled starspawn** is a voracious creature of chaos, relying on its nimble [tentacles](/List_of_tentacles "List of tentacles") to capture prey and pull it into range of its terrible mouth. Any time you are damaged by a tentacle, you are pulled one space toward the starspawn. They can be found in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                       |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Spawn Tentacles](/Spawn_Tentacles "Spawn Tentacles") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- The tentacles have speed 10, but since their movement is relative to the head, they can follow you at speed 20 while the main body is still in your LOS. Most characters will need [Haste](/Haste "Haste")+[Swiftness](/Swiftness "Swiftness") to outrun them.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), tentacled starspawn could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").
- Tentacled starspawn were added in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12").
html:
Tentacled starspawn

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.17: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
tentacled starspawn X 
HP 58-118
HD 16
XP 2276
Speed 10
AC 5
EV 5
Will 120
Attack1 40 (bite: plain)
Attack2 25 (tentacle slap: plain)


Resistances rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Non-living
Size Giant
Type tentacled starspawn, tentacled starspawn
Flags
A lumbering maw shrouded in a mass of sinuous tentacles. On spotting prey, its tentacles lunge outward, dragging victims directly to its waiting gullet.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

A tentacled starspawn is a voracious creature of chaos, relying on its nimble tentacles to capture prey and pull it into range of its terrible mouth. Any time you are damaged by a tentacle, you are pulled one space toward the starspawn. They can be found in the Abyss.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Spawn Tentacles Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • The tentacles have speed 10, but since their movement is relative to the head, they can follow you at speed 20 while the main body is still in your LOS. Most characters will need Haste+Swiftness to outrun them.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, tentacled starspawn could see invisible.
  • Tentacled starspawn were added in 0.12.
